ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Suprimentos import CPRequisicaoPai from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode
breadcrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles() requisicaoPai = breadcrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CP_REQUISICOESPAI"))
status = CPRequisicaoPai.BuscarStatus(requisicaoPai.Handle.Value)
if status == 2 or status == 4 or status == 5: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
